participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, she often reflects on her experiences and emotions.
participant_1.background: I was feeling down about my smoking habit, so I took my dog to the park and we played fetch for a while. My husband was a career soldier. I love chocolate. I love to visit websites about dogs and the rain. I have bad luck with relationships.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, she enjoys expressing herself through fashion and has a passion for community events.
participant_2.background: I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. My mother worked for Apple. I am not out to my family and I am worried about their acceptance. I drive a BMW. My favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: I went to the park with my dog today and we played fetch.
That's really nice! I love dogs. I wish I had one.
They're great companions. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to one before.
You should go! They're really great. You get to meet people who are really passionate about the same things you are.
That sounds really fun. I'll have to look into it.
You should! I'm sure you'd have a great time.
Thanks! I appreciate the suggestion.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read and I love chocolate.
Me too! I love to read fantasy novels.
I love to read mysteries.
Oh, those are fun too. I love to be kept guessing.
Me too! I love the feeling of finally figuring out who the killer is.
Me too! It's so satisfying.
What's your favorite mystery novel?
I have so many favorites, but I think I'd have to say The Girl on the Train.
Oh, I've heard good things about that one. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem
